sentences.en: The child's same-sex parent acts as a role model.
sentences.cn: 孩子的同性家长是孩子效仿的榜样。

sentences.en: Same-sex marriages are not recognized. Similarly, marriages of close relatives are not legal.
sentences.cn: 同性婚姻得不到承认。同样，近亲结婚也不合法。

sentences.en: Same thing, get her to write down her sex.
sentences.cn: 同样地，让她写下她的性别。
